00041     public class BuddyList : Plugin {

00050         private int myAccountId = -1;

00063             this.pluginInfo = new Info();

00067         // PUBLIC Methods
00068         // ============================================
00070         public override void Initialize (INyFolder iNyFolder) {
00071             this.nyFolder = iNyFolder;
00072 
00073             // Initialize GUI Events
00074             this.nyFolder.UserLogin += new BlankEventHandler(OnUserLogin);
00075             this.nyFolder.LoginDialogStarted += new BlankEventHandler(OnLoginDialogStart);
00076             this.nyFolder.LoginDialogClosed += new BlankEventHandler(OnLoginDialogClose);
00077             this.nyFolder.MainWindowStarted += new BlankEventHandler(OnMainWindowStart);
00078             this.nyFolder.MainWindowClosed += new BlankEventHandler(OnMainWindowClose);
00079             CmdManager.AddProtocolEvent += new SetProtocolEventHandler(OnAddProtocolEvent);
00080             CmdManager.DelProtocolEvent += new SetProtocolEventHandler(OnDelProtocolEvent);
00081         }

00083         // ============================================
00084         // PRIVATE (Methods) Event Handlers
00085         // ============================================
00086         private void OnUserLogin (object sender) {
00087             GUI.Dialogs.Login login = this.nyFolder.LoginDialog;
00088             if (login.RememberPassword && login.SecureAuthentication) {
00089                 BuddyDb.AddAccount(login.Username, login.Password);
00090             }
00091             myAccountId = BuddyDb.AccountId(login.Username);
00092         }
00093 
00094         private void OnLoginDialogStart (object sender) {
00095             Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00096                 GUI.Dialogs.Login login = sender as GUI.Dialogs.Login;
00097 
00098                 // Fill User Entry Completion
00099                 string[] accounts = BuddyDb.Accounts();
00100                 login.UserNameCompletion.Model = CreateEntryCompletion(accounts);
00101                 login.UserNameComboBoxAppend(accounts);
00102                 login.UserNameCompletion.TextColumn = 0;
00103 
00104                 // Add Login Dialogs Menus
00105                 AddLoginDialogMenus(login);
00106 
00107                 // Add Event Handler When Password Entry Get Focus
00108                 login.PasswordFocusIn += new FocusInEventHandler(OnPasswordFocusIn);
00109             });
00110         }
00111 
00112         private void OnLoginDialogClose (object sender) {
00113             GUI.Dialogs.Login login = sender as GUI.Dialogs.Login;
00114             login.PasswordFocusIn -= new FocusInEventHandler(OnPasswordFocusIn);
00115         }
00116 
00117         private void OnMainWindowStart (object sender) {
00118             GUI.Window window = sender as GUI.Window;
00119 
00120             // Initialize Buddy List Component
00121             InitializeBuddyListMenu();
00122 
00123             // Network GUI Event
00124             NetworkViewer networkViewer = window.NotebookViewer.NetworkViewer;
00125             NetworkManager.UserAccept += new AcceptUserHandler(OnAcceptUser);
00126             networkViewer.RefreshPeers += new BlankEventHandler(OnNetViewerRefresh);
00127             networkViewer.UserLoggedIn += new PeerSelectedHandler(OnUserLoggedIn);
00128             networkViewer.UserLoggedOut += new PeerSelectedHandler(OnUserLoggedOut);
00129         }
00130 
00131         private void OnMainWindowClose (object sender) {
00132             GUI.Window window = sender as GUI.Window;
00133             NetworkViewer networkViewer = window.NotebookViewer.NetworkViewer;
00134 
00135             // Stop Auto Add Buddy Timeout
00136             timeoutAddBuddyRet = false;
00137 
00138             // Remove Network GUI Event
00139             NetworkManager.UserAccept -= new AcceptUserHandler(OnAcceptUser);
00140             networkViewer.RefreshPeers -= new BlankEventHandler(OnNetViewerRefresh);
00141             networkViewer.UserLoggedIn -= new PeerSelectedHandler(OnUserLoggedIn);
00142             networkViewer.UserLoggedOut -= new PeerSelectedHandler(OnUserLoggedOut);
00143         }

00147         // ============================================
00148         private void OnPasswordFocusIn (object obj, FocusInEventArgs args) {
00149             Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00150                 GUI.Dialogs.Login login = this.nyFolder.LoginDialog;
00151                 login.Password = BuddyDb.AccountPassword(login.Username);
00152             });
00153         }
00154 
00155         private void OnUserLoggedIn (object sender, UserInfo userInfo) {
00156             if (userInfo.SecureAuthentication == false)
00157                 return;
00158 
00159             // Add Only Secure Auth User
00160             BuddyDb.AddUser(myAccountId, userInfo.Name, true);
00161         }
00162 
00163         private void OnUserLoggedOut (object sender, UserInfo userInfo) {
00164             if (ShowOfflineBuddies == false)
00165                 return;
00166 
00167             if (userInfo.SecureAuthentication == false)
00168                 return;
00169 
00170             // Add Only Secure Auth User
00171             if (BuddyDb.UserIsInList(myAccountId, userInfo.Name) == true) {
00172                 Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00173                     // Load All Offline Buddy
00174                     NetworkViewer networkViewer = sender as NetworkViewer;
00175                     networkViewer.Store.Add(new UserInfo(userInfo.Name, true));
00176                 });
00177             }
00178         }
00179 
00180         private AcceptUserType OnAcceptUser (PeerSocket peer, UserInfo userInfo) {
00181             if (userInfo.SecureAuthentication == false)
00182                 return(AcceptUserType.Ask);
00183 
00184             UsersTable usersDb = new UsersTable();
00185 
00186             // If User isn't into DB
00187             if (usersDb.IsPresent(myAccountId, userInfo.Name) == false) {
00188                 usersDb.Dispose();
00189                 return(AcceptUserType.Ask);
00190             }
00191 
00192             // Get User Accept Status
00193             bool acceptUser = usersDb.GetAccept(myAccountId, userInfo.Name);
00194 
00195             usersDb.Dispose();
00196             return(acceptUser ? AcceptUserType.Yes : AcceptUserType.No);
00197         }
00198         
00199         // When Network Viewer is Refreshed
00200         private void OnNetViewerRefresh (object sender) {
00201             Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00202                 NetworkViewer networkViewer = sender as NetworkViewer;
00203 
00204                 AutoAddBuddyTimeout();
00205                 if (ShowOfflineBuddies == true) {
00206                     // Load All Offline Buddies
00207                     networkViewer.Store.Add(GetOfflineUsers());
00208                 }
00209             });
00210         }
00211 
00212         private void OnShowOfflineBuddies (object sender, EventArgs args) {
00213             Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00214                 NetworkViewer networkViewer = nyFolder.MainWindow.NotebookViewer.NetworkViewer;
00215                 ToggleAction action = sender as ToggleAction;
00216 
00217                 if (action.Active == true) {
00218                     // Load All Offline Buddies
00219                     networkViewer.Store.Add(GetOfflineUsers());
00220                 } else {
00221                     // Remove All Offline Buddies
00222                     networkViewer.Store.RemoveAllOffline();
00223                 }
00224             });
00225         }
00226 
00227         private void OnAddProtocolEvent (P2PManager p2pManager) {
00228             // Auto Add Buddy Timeout (2min)
00229             timeoutAddBuddyRet = true;
00230             AutoAddBuddyTimeout();
00231             GLib.Timeout.Add(120000, AutoAddBuddyTimeout);
00232         }
00233 
00234         private void OnDelProtocolEvent (P2PManager p2pManager) {
00235             // Stop Auto Add Buddy Timeout
00236             timeoutAddBuddyRet = false;
00237         }
00238 
00239         private bool AutoAddBuddyTimeout() {
00240             // If I'm Offline Skip
00241             if (P2PManager.IsListening() == false)
00242                 return(timeoutAddBuddyRet);
00243 
00244             // If Timeout is Ended
00245             if (timeoutAddBuddyRet != true)
00246                 return(false);
00247 
00248             // Get Offline Users
00249             UserInfo[] offline = GetOfflineUsers();
00250             if (offline == null) return(timeoutAddBuddyRet);
00251 
00252             // Connect Offline Users
00253             foreach (UserInfo userInfo in offline) {
00254                 UserConnect(userInfo);
00255                 Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00256                     AddUserToNetworkViewer(userInfo);
00257                 });
00258             }
00259 
00260             return(timeoutAddBuddyRet);
00261         }
00262 
00263         // ============================================
00264         // PRIVATE Methods
00265         // ============================================
00266         private ListStore CreateEntryCompletion (string[] accNames) {
00267             // No Account Saved
00268             if (accNames == null) return(null);
00269 
00270             // Add Account
00271             ListStore store = new ListStore(typeof(string));
00272             foreach (string name in accNames)
00273                 store.AppendValues(name);
00274             return(store);
00275         }
00276 
00277         private UserInfo[] GetOfflineUsers() {
00278             string[] users = BuddyDb.AccountAcceptedUsers(myAccountId);
00279             if (users == null) return(null);
00280 
00281             ArrayList offlineUsers = new ArrayList();
00282             foreach (string username in users) {
00283                 if (UserIsInList(username) == false)
00284                     offlineUsers.Add(new UserInfo(username, true));
00285             }
00286 
00287             return((UserInfo[]) offlineUsers.ToArray(typeof(UserInfo)));
00288         }
00289 
00290         private bool UserIsInList (string username) {
00291             if (P2PManager.KnownPeers == null)
00292                 return(false);
00293 
00294             foreach (UserInfo userInfo in P2PManager.KnownPeers.Keys) {
00295                 if (userInfo.Name == username) return(true);
00296             }
00297 
00298             return(false);
00299         }
00300 
00301         private void UserConnect (UserInfo userInfo) {
00302             if (userInfo.SecureAuthentication == false)
00303                 return;
00304 
00305             try {
00306                 // Connect & Send Login
00307                 userInfo.GetIpAndPort();
00308                 Debug.Log("Auto Add Buddy: {0} {1}:{2}", userInfo.Name, userInfo.Ip, userInfo.Port);
00309                 P2PManager.AddPeer(userInfo, userInfo.Ip, userInfo.Port);
00310                 PeerSocket peer = (PeerSocket) P2PManager.KnownPeers[userInfo];
00311                 Cmd.Login(peer, MyInfo.GetInstance());
00312             } catch (Exception e) {
00313                 Debug.Log("Connection To {0} Failed: {1}", userInfo.Name, e.Message);
00314             }
00315         }
00316 
00317         private void InitializeBuddyListMenu() {
00318             ToggleActionEntry[] toggleEntries = new ToggleActionEntry[] {
00319                 new ToggleActionEntry("ShowOffLineBuddies", null, 
00320                                       "Show Offline Buddies", null,
00321                                        null, new EventHandler(OnShowOfflineBuddies), false),
00322             };
00323 
00324             string ui = "<ui>" +
00325                         "  <menubar name='MenuBar'>" +
00326                         "    <menu action='NetworkMenu'>" +
00327                         "      <separator />" +
00328                         "      <menuitem action='ShowOffLineBuddies' />" +
00329                         "    </menu>" +
00330                         "  </menubar>" +
00331                         "</ui>";
00332 
00333             nyFolder.MainWindow.Menu.AddMenus(ui, toggleEntries);
00334         }
00335 
00336         private void AddUserToNetworkViewer (UserInfo userInfo) {
00337             NetworkViewer networkViewer = nyFolder.MainWindow.NotebookViewer.NetworkViewer;
00338             networkViewer.Store.Add(userInfo);
00339         }
00340 
00341         private void AddLoginDialogMenus (GUI.Dialogs.Login login) {
00342             ActionEntry[] entries = new ActionEntry[] {
00343 //              new ActionEntry("FileMenu", null, "_File", null, null, null),
00344     
00345                 // File Menu
00346                 new ActionEntry("Accounts", null, "Accounts", null, 
00347                                 "Accounts", new EventHandler(OnAccountsDialog))
00348             };
00349 
00350             string ui = "<ui>" +
00351                         "  <menubar name='MenuBar'>" +
00352                         "    <menu action='FileMenu'>" +
00353                         "      <menuitem action='Accounts' position='top'/>" +
00354                         "    </menu>" +
00355                         "  </menubar>" +
00356                         "</ui>";
00357 
00358             login.Menu.AddMenus(ui, entries);
00359         }
00360 
00361         private void OnAccountsDialog (object sender, EventArgs args) {
00362             Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00363                 AccountsDialog dialog = new AccountsDialog();
00364                 dialog.Run();
00365                 dialog.Destroy();
00366             });
00367         }

00373             get {
00374                 MenuManager menu = nyFolder.MainWindow.Menu;
00375                 string menuPath = "/MenuBar/NetworkMenu/ShowOffLineBuddies";
